comment: Senior Seminar. Book review, speech, and thesis paper. Not difficult, but extremely time consuming. START EARLY! Trust me! Very helpful and so nice, but she didn't explain some things because she assumed that other teachers already did (and they should have).
In the two years here, I can say that this instructor has been hands down my favorite. While others hide behind the syllabus and are vague, she had me coming back for more! Great job!

Excellent professor! Responds to her emails in a timely fashion...extremely helpful!!! Keep up with the reading and you will be ok...exams are quite reasonable and relevant to everything she teaches...highly recommended!!!

Grading: 3 quizzes, drops lowest grade of the 3, 1 reflective essay about what you thoughts you have of the current chapter, very easy A if you use at least a couple key terms, 1 mid term and one final, all test are open book with notes, 1 discussion grade but easy A if you just say something once in awhile!  Easy grading and will work with you!

If you need to take this class TAKE HER! I was told to stay away from Hallward and so instead I chose her which I am so glad I did. She is so amazing and clear.  I did not think I would pass this class especially because it was online but it is easy to get an A. I usually get B's but passed with an A.  She's so great and makes this class fun!
I took this class online during the summer and it was easy. Dr. Z is a great professor & nice. She responds to emails quickly.  Just do your assignments and you will get an "A."

Dr. Knos is a good professor. yea the class (3hrs) is boring because the subject itself is boring. She tries her best to make it fun and incorporate visuals. She is understanding and allows a page note on exams. Attendance is mandatory =25%, group presentation = 25%, midterms & finals = 25% each plus few extra credits here and there. Worked for me!
Great online class, Prof Z is very helpful and is highly involved in topics of discussion.  Looking forward to more classes w/this professor.
Very boring class:(  She mixes the attendance and midterm grades to give a grade for presentation. What a stupid concept. Not helpfull at all. Whole class was falling asleep in her lectures.

Seeing that Dr. Z only had a 2.4 easiness rating, i was again reminded how utterly lazy KSU students are.  I had her for U.S. Foreign Policy, an upper-level class, and was shocked by how easy it was.  Tests were open-book AND multiple choice.  Reading was moderate.  If you can't get the grade you want from Dr. Z, drop out.
Demanding but fair.

I TOOK HER CLASS ON SUMMER. It WAS THE BEST CLASS I HAVE EVER HAD. IT IS A LIE THAT HER CLASS IS CONFUSING. TEST AND QUIZES ARE VERY CLEAR AND COVER ONLY MATERIAL THAT HAS BEEN DISCUSSED. SHE IS VERY HELPFUL AND UNDERSTANDING PROFESSOR. IF YOU HAVE ANY INTEREST IN WORLD POLITICS YOU CAN CARRY A LOT  FROM HER CLASS.
A great teacher who loves her job.  If you aren't participating in the discussions you won't do well.  Take part in the discussions every week and read your case studies they are fairly short.
very dynamic and publishes in her field
Very responsive to student needs.

DO NOT TAKE HER ONLINE CLASS!! AWFUL! Is unclear, gives too much work, tests and quizes overly hard, and the text book she chooses is one of the WORST I have ever read! I took this class to acquire a better understanding of politics, but now I just hate them with a fiery passion!!
She is kind of spacey. Her tests are all over the place! LOTS of reading! stay on top of it!! she really knows her material though, and enjoys teaching. She loves pictures, and loves to travel.

Lectures are colorful and draw you in. LOTS of reading.  Read the material and you should do well.  Ask questions and get involved, it's fun to get a hot debate going and see where it goes from there.  Tests tend to be all over, but based on the readings.
No Comments

Lectures are interesting, but get off track easily.  She tests on assigned reading not lectures.  Her questioning format is random.  there is no method or general theme followed on what she wants you to know. Exorbitant reading!!
Dr. Z makes class discussions like nothing else. She's wonderful. My favorite prof at KSU

This was my fave teacher at KSU!!! I had her a total of 5 times throughout my years at the university. I strongly recommend her b/c she is not that easy, but she makes the material fun and gives clarity to whatever topic she is teaching.
